column5: A last minute change in plans sent Andrew and I off to the Kawarthas for a muskie hunt. We worked hard and ended up having a decent day on the water. 5 fish landed, 6 follows with one being a giant. All fish were landed between 11am and 4pm under bluebird skies and calm - which is really strange for the Kawarthas! No action at all during the usual productive dawn/dusk times. Oh well, that's fishing for you - just when you think you have things figured out... Andrew caught a 40" and 33", I got a 39", 38" and 35". Nothing huge, but lots of fun and great battles - Andrew's 40 did a massive jump that was at least 3' high and 10' across - the most spectacular jump we have ever witnessed. Here's a few pics.
Well done! I've always had better luck with the sun higher.
Amazing. Beautiful fish guys!
Some real beauties there, thanks for sharing
Great outing Pete and Andrew.As said when you think you have it figured out,you never really do lol.Nice fish guys !!!
Nice looking fish.  You guys are well into double digits on 2 trips....not a bad year so far!
nice fish guys
Nice work fellas!
Good stuff Pete! Now if I could only get the ones down here to bite
LOL Pete and I just talked about that. Glad I'm not the only one just seeing musky cruising.
Nice day's catch guys
Nice healthy fish!
Awesome muskies! way too go!
A couple of those are fatties, nice shootin`!
Man, I havent had a follow yet this year!! Only been out twice, and only trolled so far, but still...not going good at all!  Nice work boys!  S.
Awesome catches!  Thanks for sharing
Solid day for sure, you cant complain when there are that many muskies in the boat!
Nice clean looking fish!  Nothing wrong with those numbers or size any time of the year.  Makes for a fun day on the water.
Nice fish sounds like you had a good day . Thanks for the report
Nice going guys what was the major for the day? Under the full moon the afternoon bite can be hot for moon under foot.
nice day to be on the water. Some entertaining fishy tales there, as always, Nice going Pete.
You got those KW skiis dialed in real good !
